name: ElvesRevengeSantaJam
description:
ElvesRevengeSantaJam!

This is a game I created for the 2021 Secret Santa Game Jam. The current release is playable, but graphics and sound will be added soon!

You are playing as Santa in a rather unfortunate situation: the elves are on strike! They don't seem to want to negotiate either, and are taking flame right to the buildings!

Use WASD to move

left-click to throw snowballs against the assailants. Snowballs also put out fires, should the situation escalate to that!

right-click to pick up or drop snow

E to build a snowman

See how many waves of elves you can survive!
